name: Wreckoon City
description:
A 2D endless skater - Skate your way through a Raccoon infested city, avoid obsticles and collect rac-coins and bonus letters for extra points.

Created for - 

MK Studios

Created with - 

Unity 2018.1.1f.1

Contributors -

Kelton Morgan-Smith - Programmer / Asset Creation

Android release

Also Available from the Google Play store - Android .Apk file (see the link below)

Advised for ages 5+
